name: Alice Simmons
title: Developer
bio: Alice has more than 8 years of programming experience, and she has written two JavaScript programming textbooks. She speaks at technology conferences and runs a JavaScript meetup group.

name: Stephanie Gomez
title: UX Designer
bio: Stephanie is a UX Designer at Saucy, where she leads the product design team. She holds a Bachelor of Fine Arts in Design from College of Oregon.

name: Benjamin Banks
title: CEO
bio: Benjamin has operational expertise in sales, marketing, and product development. Benjamins has a Bachelor of Science Degree in Business Administration from the Georgia University.

name: Laura Russell
title: Team Lead
bio: Laura has 8 years of experience in the creative software industry. She has experience in building desktop apps and low-level programming on multiple platforms using C++ and Python.

name: Donald Rodriguez
title: Support Engineer
bio: Donald is a member of the engineering team and enjoys interacting with the Saucy community. He has development experience in JavaScript, Java, and C++.

name: Philip Harper
title: Senior UI Engineer
bio: Philip is a Senior UI Engineer and has been there for five years running. He has more than 9 years of application development experience, with a focus on web and mobile applications. He enjoys rock climbing, parachuting, and spelunking.

name: Frances Cox
title: Development Engineer
bio: Frances is a Development Engineer on the Saucy JavaScript team. She has worked on Java enterprise apps with web front-ends for about 6 years. In her spare time, she likes to play in her rock band and go parasailing.

name: Eric White
title: Sales Engineer
bio: Eric is a Sales Engineer. He provides pre-sales technical assistance for Saucy products. He has more than 9 years of experience developing innovative, web-based applications using a variety of technologies. He specializes in C# and JavaScript.

name: Judith Riley
title: Software Engineer
bio: Judith is a Software Engineer at Saucy on the JavaScript development team. She has 12 years of experience as a developer and has focused most of her career on web development with skills in HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS. Prior to joining Saucy, Judith worked for companies in the healthcare and financial services industries.

name: Betty Hamilton
title: Director of Engineering
bio: Betty is the Engineering Director at Saucy. She has more than 11 years of software engineering experience on a broad range of platforms. Her experience includes designing web applications, network protocols, and device drivers. She loves to go hiking and biking in her spare time.

name: Billy Powell
title: President and CEO
bio: Billy has more than 17 years of experience in the IT field, including application development and network support. He has a Bachelor of Science degree from New Western University.

name: Melissa Sanders
title: Software Developer
bio: Melissa is a software developer, focusing on building and designing web applications. Melissa speaks at JavaScript meetups and events. She enjoy motocross racing in her spare time.

name: Philip Evans
title: Team Leader
bio: Philip has more than 22 years of experience as an IT professional. He has developed and designed web and mobile applications. He frequently gives talks at JavaScript meetups. He spends his spare time ocean kayaking.

name: Theresa Reyes
title: Software Architect
bio: Theresa has 5 years of experience developing web applications. She regularly speaks at open source conferences and meetups. She enjoys skiing, camping, and kite-surfing.

name: Peter Berry
title: System Architect
bio: Peter has more than 20 years of IT experience, and the last 10 have been focused on web applications. He speaks at web app conferences and meetups. He enjoys french cooking and training for ironman.

name: Pat Castillo
title: Director of Product Management
bio: Pat is director of product management at Saucy. She builds new product strategies and develops market opportunities. She has a BS degree from State University of Tallahassee.

name: Harry Patterson
title: IT Director
bio: Harry has more than 18 years of experience in IT. Harry has a a BS degree in Computer Science. He enjoys playing cricket and ice hockey.

name: Diana Woods
title: Software Engineer
bio: Diana is a software engineer focusing on building web app front-ends. Diana likes to work on new technologies, especially for the web and mobile. She spends her spare time curling and fencing.

name: Doris Gutierrez
title: Principal Software Engineer
bio: Doris is a Principal Software Engineer who focuses on software design, development, and consulting. She develops web app back-ends and has experience in JavaScript, Java, C#, and node.js. She enjoys horseback riding and rowing.

name: Cheryl Peterson
title: Principal Architect
bio: Cheryl is a Principal Architect at Saucy where she helps companies design and develop web apps. She has more than 8 years of experience in web app development and testing. She enjoys sailing and playing rugby.

name: Nicholas Fisher
title: COO
bio: Nicholas is COO of Technology Cache and has more than 12 years of experience in running software companies. He enjoys bowling and cycling.

name: Deborah Jackson
title: Chief Software Architect
bio: Deborah has 14 years of experience in developing front-end and back-end systems. Her programming skills include JavaScript, C#, and Java. She enjoys parasailing and canoeing.

name: Shawn Greene
title: Principal Software Engineer
bio: Shawn is a Principal Software Engineer at Saucy. He has been working in website design and web application development for nearly 12 years. He's working in the automotive and entertainment industries. Shawn enjoys playing darts and badminton.

name: Gary Reid
title: Technical Marketing Manager
bio: Gary is a Technical Marketing Manager at Saucy. He has development experience in web and mobile applications. In his spare time, he enjoys watercolor painting and traing for triathalons.

name: Ronald Wallace
title: Software Engineer
bio: Ronald has experience working on website development and design as well as NodeJS applictions and enterprise web applications. He enjoys spending time in nature and horseback riding.

name: Bonnie Sanders
title: Sr. UI Developer
bio: Bonnie is a Web UI Developer. She focuses on delivering the best user experience using the latest web tech. She enjoys snowboarding and bungee jumping.

name: Brian Armstrong
title: Programmer
bio: Brian is a programmer at Lelandsoft. He has experience in several programming languages including C#, Java, and Python, but he enjoys coding in JavaScript the most. He has 6 years of development experience. He also enjoys base jumping and wingsuit flying.

name: Heather Ford
title: Sales Engineer
bio: Heather is a sales engineer at Saucy. She has experience in both front-end and back-end development. She has also written two books on web app development. She enjoys rock climbing and sandboarding.

name: Joshua Fuller
title: Sales Engineer
bio: Joshua is a Sales Engineer with Saucy and has more than 8 years of experience in the software services industry. He has experience in JavaScript, CSS, and NodeJS. He also enjoys downhill mountain biking and parachuting.

name: Diane Moore
title: Software Engineer
bio: Diane is a Software Engineer at Saucy. Over the last 12 years, she’s worked on a number of enterprise application projects using her experience in C#, Java, and most recently JavaScript. She also enjoy base jumping and golf.

name: Norma Flores
title: Sr. Engineering Manager
bio: Norma is the Senior Engineering Manager at Saucy. She has more than 12 years of experience in building enterprise applications. She enjoys judo and tennis in her spare time.

name: Kathy Bryant
title: Senior Solutions Engineer
bio: Kathy is a Senior Solutions Engineer at Saucy, where she develops large enterprise applications. She has experience building apps in ASP, ASP.NET, C#, and JavaScript. Kathy enjoys cycling, softball, and training for marathons.

name: Harry Tucker
title: Founder
bio: Harry has almost 10 years of web app development experience. He speaks at JavaScript conferences and meetups. He also enjoys zorbing and kitesurfing.

name: Peter Gray
title: CEO
bio: Peter is CEO of Insight Country. He has more than 12 years of experience in sales, services, and support. He enjoys motocross racing and mountainboarding.

name: Howard Hawkins
title: Senior Software Engineer
bio: Howard is a Senior Software Engineer at Saucy. He has experience in JavaScript, NodeJS, and C#. He also enjoys rock climbing and cave diving.

name: Rose Cooper
title: Solution Architect
bio: Rose is a solutions architect at Amaze Exchange. She has more than 12 years of development experience in building enterprise applications. She enjoys playing pool and weightlifting.

name: Sara Walker
title: Senior Programmer
bio: Sara is the co-creator of Addendum Apps and a Senior Programmer. She has experience designing and developing web apps for large companies. She enjoys kayaking and caving in her spare time.

name: James Roberts
title: Sr. Software Architect
bio: James has 15 years of experience in the IT industry. He has built large enterprise apps to run remote services teams. He spend his spare time doing nature photography and training for ironman.

name: Beverly Spencer
title: Sales Engineer
bio: Beverly is a Sales Engineer at Saucy and has been a software developer for more than 9 years. She has experience as a front-end developer. Beverly graduated from Thulmen University.

name: Raymond Kelley
title: Founder
bio: Raymond is one of the founders of Redefine Television, working on web and mobile apps for the entertainment industry. He also enjoys badminton and chess.

name: Amy Davis
title: CTO
bio: Amy is a developer and architect, and she's the CTO at WolfeSrpint. She speaks at developer conferences and meetups. She enjoys snowboarding and base jumping in her spare time.

name: Norma Olson
title: Senior Software Engineer
bio: Norma is a Senior Software Engineer at Saucy. She has more than 20 years of coding experience including developing rich user interfaces on both mobile and desktop platforms. She also enjoys playing handball and driving in formula 1 racing.

name: Stephen Morris
title: CTO
bio: Stephen is the Founder and CTO of Think Vendors, a software engineering services provider. He has experience in software development and testing. He also enjoys doing parkour and ice climbing.

name: Daniel Fisher
title: CTO
bio: Daniel is the founder and CTO of QRU, a software services company. He has worked on many enterprise app development projects and has experience in JavaScript, Java, and C#. He enjoys playing netball and doing gymnastics.

name: Ronald Richardson
title: Software Engineer
bio: Ronald is a software engineer Sevler. His expertise is in web development, and he prefers to code in JavaScript. He enjoys playing ultimate frisbee and the tuba.

name: Maria Bailey
title: Senior Engineer
bio: Maria is a Senior Engineer at Saucy. She has been programming for more than 20 years and has worked on web apps for more than 6 years. She also enjoys cycling and archery.

name: Jonathan Morgan
title: Director of Application Development
bio: Jonathan is Director of Application Development at Approach Music. He focuses on building end-to-end enterprise web apps. He loves to work on application design and development. He spends his free time fencing and rowing.

name: Scott Long
title: Sr. Developer
company: Up And To The Right Tech
bio: Scott is a Sr. Programmer at Up And To The Right Tech, where he develops apps using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. He focuses primarily on mobile app development using web tech. He also enjoys wingsuit flying and kitesurfing.

name: Betty Murphy
title: Lead UI Developer and Designer
bio: Betty has experience in development, UI design, and marketing. She has 9 years of experience in JavaScript and HTML programming. She also enjoys slacklining and heli-skiing.

name: Howard Stevens
title: Product Manager
bio: Howard is a Product Manager at Saucy and is passionate about innovations in mobile and web technologies. He has an MBA from DeJohn University and an MS in Computer Science. He enjoys swimming and badminton.

name: Jose Washington
title: GIS Analyst/Developer
bio: Jose has 11 years of programming experience in C# and ASP.NET. He also has four years of JavaScript experience. He loves to focus on building mobile apps that make people's lives easier to manage. He enjoys canyoning and mountainboarding.
